00017 #include "MisrReadData.h"
00018 #include "MisrCoordQuery.h"
00019 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00020 #include "MisrError.h"
00021 #include "MisrCache.h"
00022 #include "MisrUtil.h"       /* NOTE: remove when below note is removed */
00023 #include "misrproj.h"
00024 #include <hdf.h>
00025 #include <HdfEosDef.h>
00026 #include <stdlib.h>

00049 MTKt_status MtkReadRaw(
00050   const char *filename,     
00051   const char *gridname,     
00052   const char *fieldname,    
00053   MTKt_Region region,       
00054   MTKt_DataBuffer *databuf, 
00055   MTKt_MapInfo *mapinfo      )
00056 {
00057   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00058   MTKt_status status_code;  /* Return status code for error macros */
00059   int32 fid = FAIL;     /* HDF-EOS File id */
00060   intn hdfstatus;       /* HDF return status */
00061 
00062   if (filename == NULL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00063 
00064   /* Open file. */
00065   fid = GDopen((char*)filename, DFACC_READ);
00066   if (fid == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDOPEN_FAILED);
00067 
00068   /* Read data. */
00069   status = MtkReadRawFid(fid, gridname, fieldname, region, databuf, mapinfo);
00070   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00071 
00072   /* Close file. */
00073   hdfstatus = GDclose(fid);
00074   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDCLOSE_FAILED);
00075   fid = FAIL;
00076 
00077   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00078  ERROR_HANDLE:
00079   if (fid != FAIL) GDclose(fid);
00080   return status_code;
00081 }
00082 
00088 MTKt_status MtkReadRawFid(
00089   int32 fid,                
00090   const char *gridname,     
00091   const char *fieldname,    
00092   MTKt_Region region,       
00093   MTKt_DataBuffer *databuf, 
00094   MTKt_MapInfo *mapinfo      )
00095 {
00096   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00097   MTKt_status status_code;  /* Return status code for error macros */
00098   MTKt_DataBuffer buf = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00099                                 /* Data buffer structure */
00100   MTKt_MapInfo map = MTKT_MAPINFO_INIT;
00101                 /* Map info structure */
00102   MTKt_DataBuffer pathbuf = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00103                 /* Temporary buffer for projection parameters Path_number grid attr. */
00104   int path;         /* Path */
00105   int resolution;       /* Resolution */
00106   MTKt_DataType datatype;   /* Datatype */
00107   MTKt_Cache blockcache = MTKT_CACHE_INIT;
00108                 /* Block cache */
00109   intn hdfstatus;       /* HDF return status */
00110   int32           HDFfid;   /* HDF file identifier (not used) */
00111   int32         sid;        /* HDF SD identifier */
00112 
00113   if (gridname == NULL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00114   if (fieldname == NULL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00115 
00116   /* Check for valid file/grid/field/dim  */
00117   status = MtkFileGridFieldCheckFid(fid, gridname, fieldname);
00118   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00119 
00120   /* Get the HDF SD identifier. */
00121   hdfstatus = EHidinfo(fid, &HDFfid, &sid);
00122   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00123     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_EHIDINFO_FAILED);
00124 
00125   /* Determine path of this filename */
00126   if (strcmp("Projection_Parameters", gridname) == 0) {
00127     status = MtkGridAttrGetFid(fid, gridname, "Path_number", &pathbuf);
00128     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00129     path = pathbuf.data.i32[0][0];
00130   } else {
00131     status = MtkFileToPathFid(sid, &path);
00132     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00133   }
00134 
00135   /* Determine resolution from filename and gridname */
00136   status = MtkFileGridToResolutionFid(fid, gridname, &resolution);
00137   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00138 
00139   /* Determine datatype from filenname, gridname and fieldname */
00140   status =MtkFileGridFieldToDataTypeFid(fid, gridname, fieldname, &datatype);
00141   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00142 
00143   /* Snap region to som grid for this path */
00144   status = MtkSnapToGrid(path, resolution, region, &map);
00145   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00146 
00147   /* Allocate the data buffer */
00148   status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(map.nline, map.nsample, datatype, &buf);
00149   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00150 
00151   /* Inital block cache */
00152   status = MtkCacheInit(fid, gridname, fieldname, &blockcache);
00153   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00154 
00155   {
00156     int b;          /* Block */
00157     float l;            /* Line */
00158     float s;            /* Sample */
00159     double x;           /* Som x */
00160     double y;           /* Som y */
00161     char *dptr;         /* Data pointer to buffer */
00162     MTKt_MisrProjParam pp;      /* Projection parameters */
00163     /* (this could come from map, instead of MtkPathToProjParam call) */
00164 
00165     MtkPathToProjParam(map.path, map.resolution, &pp);
00166     misr_init(pp.nblock, pp.nline, pp.nsample, pp.reloffset, pp.ulc, pp.lrc);
00167 
00168     dptr = (char *)buf.dataptr;
00169     for (x = map.som.ulc.x; x <= map.som.lrc.x; x += map.resolution) {
00170       for (y = map.som.ulc.y; y <= map.som.lrc.y; y += map.resolution) {
00171     misrfor(x, y, &b, &l, &s);
00172     MtkCachePixelGet(&blockcache, b, l, s, dptr);
00173     dptr += buf.datasize;
00174       }
00175     }
00176   }
00177 
00178   MtkCacheFree(&blockcache);
00179 
00180   *databuf = buf;
00181   *mapinfo = map;
00182 
00183   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00184  ERROR_HANDLE:
00185   MtkCacheFree(&blockcache);
00186   MtkDataBufferFree(&buf);
00187   return status_code;
00188 }
